name: Bridge of Peace
description:
Bridge of Peace - June 2018 - Winner of the Tehran Istanbul Play (TIP) Jam!

This game developed for Tehran Istanbul Play (TIP) Jam. Theme was "Bridges" and we developed bridge puzzle game. These bridge puzzles means communication problems between political or mythical leaders. If player can complete the puzzles, leaders run and hug each other. It means that communication problems of them solved.

TEAM:

Gokhan Yahya TORBA - Developer & Director

Turan Sayar - Level & UI Designer

Seyed AliReza Hosseini - 2D&3D Artist

Dogan Ramiz Inanc - Level Designer
